comments: Row m=6 of the array A(3; m,n) := (2*n+m)!!/m!!, m >= 0, n >= 0.
formula: a(n) = (2*n+6)!!/6!!.E.g.f.: 1/(1-2*x)^4.a(n) = n!*2^(n-4)/3, n>=3. - _Zerinvary Lajos_, Sep 23 2006G.f.: G(0)/2, where G(k)= 1 + 1/(1 - x/(x + 1/(2*k+8)/G(k+1))); (continued fraction). - _Sergei N. Gladkovskii_, Jun 02 2013
mathematica: s=1;lst={s};Do[s+=(s*=n);AppendTo[lst, s], {n, 4, 5!}];lst (* _Vladimir Joseph Stephan Orlovsky_, Nov 15 2008 *)
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_
